Description of incident: A public records request for employee payroll information was received. The documents were prepared by the Human Resources Department. One of the documents that was released had un-formatted SSN. They were not identified as SSN. Once the document was released to the person who requested they posted the information on a Closed Facebook page. The SSN were not identified. I was notified about the post and contacted our City Attorney. Person posting info and Facebook was notified and the information was taken down approximately 3 hours after we learned it was posted.
